filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#55-134) has bitwise-xor operator ^ instead of the exponentiation operator **: 
	 - inverse = (3 * denominator) ^ 2 (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#116)

Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#55-134) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- denominator = denominator / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#101)
	- inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#122)

Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#55-134) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- prod0 = prod0 / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#104)
	- result = prod0 * inverse (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#131)

Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#55-134) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- denominator = denominator / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#101)
	- inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#120)

Math.mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#55-134) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- denominator = denominator / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#101)
	- inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#124)

	- denominator = denominator / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#101)
	- inverse *= 2 - denominator * inverse (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#123)

	- denominator = denominator / twos (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#101)
	- inverse = (3 * denominator) ^ 2 (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol#116)

ERC721._checkOnERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#399-421) has external calls inside a loop: retval = IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received(_msgSender(),from,tokenId,data) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#406-417)
	Calls stack containing the loop:
		MaxMint721.mint(uint256)
		ERC721._safeMint(address,uint256)
		ERC721._safeMint(address,uint256,bytes)
